Sets trim option via option. (disabled dedent)
---
{"trim":true,"dedent":false}
---
<vue-component-usage>
    line 1
    line 2
</vue-component-usage>
---
<vue-component-usage-test>
<template v-slot:code>    line 1
    line 2</template>
<template v-slot:result>    line 1
    line 2</template>
</vue-component-usage-test>
